I want to prepare a proposal for NAPA/City of Chicago to consider that would: 1) provide higher quality, Original Equipment replacement brake parts the meet Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standard 135 2) reduce the city's downtime by decreasing repari frequency. In order to do this I need to know if our dealerships and distributors parts are priced competitively verses parts is sourcing and selling to the City. I will go to our General office and ask for a price concession for the City.
